main event: A citizen in Marrero, Louisiana, observed a white object that appeared to materialize at high speed and then quickly disappear.
interesting points: The observation duration was between 3 to 5 seconds,The sighting occurred on November 6, 1957, at 4:55 CST,The object was heading from northwest to southeast,The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting,There were no photographs associated with the report.
